Prerequisites: ACG 3103 AND (ACG 3341 OR ACG 3401 OR TAX 4001)
Course Description: CONTINUATION OF ACG 3103. TOPICS COVERED INCLUDE PROPERTY, PLANT AND EQUIPMENT, INTANGIBLES, CURRENT LIABILITIES, LONG-TERM DEBT, LEASES, TAX ALLOCATION, STATEMENT OF CASH FLOWS.
Textbook(s): INTERMEDIATE ACCOUNTING BY KIESO, WEYGANDT AND WARFIELD (12TH EDITION, WILEY, 2007)
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
